title: Manulife Banks Nearly $4.7 Billion for Second Infrastructure Investment Fund
sub_head: The Toronto-based insurer’s investment arm has raised its largest fund ever
body:
Manulife Investment Management has raised $4.65 billion to invest in infrastructure, a sector where investors’ hopes have been sparked by the transition to renewable energy and the possibility of increased U.S. government spending.
The new vehicle, Manulife Infrastructure Fund II LP, received a little less than half of its capital from parent...
